business.name: Wellness Medical Center
business.tagline: Comprehensive Care for Your Whole Family

hero.headline: Comprehensive Care for Your Whole Family
hero.subheadline: From routine checkups to specialized care, our team of physicians is here for you at every stage of life.

items.title: Family-Centered Care
items.description: Treating patients from newborns to seniors

items.description: Urgent care available when you need it

items.description: We work with all major insurance plans

items.name: Urgent Care

items.name: Michelle T.
items.text: Dr. Patel has been our family doctor for 10 years. She knows us, listens to us, and always takes time to explain everything.

items.name: James R.
items.text: The telehealth option is a lifesaver for busy parents. Quality care without the waiting room.

items.name: Linda C.
items.text: After a cancer scare, the team here was with me every step of the way. Compassionate, thorough care.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: Founded in 2005, Wellness Medical Center was built on a simple belief: healthcare should be accessible, compassionate, and comprehensive. Our team of physicians, nurses, and staff are dedicated to treating the whole person, not just symptoms.
